availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel W. Glassie (Kentucky agent & captain 1st ind. ky battery USA)

body.p: Kentucky agent and soldier. Kentucky native. Agent in 1861. Served in the 1st Independent Kentucky Battery (U.S.A.) as sergeant, lieutenant, and captain from June 3, 1861, to July 20, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Davidson County, Nashville, 5th Ward, p. 302B.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0150.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Kentucky, Application #894774, Certificate #832918.
